landing.subtitle: find more [ M A P S ]
landing.title: collection sharing

upload.disclaimer:
osu.db are only used for referencing the map in your collection.db and will not be uploaded!
thus we may collect some data to improve other user's experirence such as your local offset.
steps:
1. select osu.db and collections.db
2. click 'read db'
3. click 'prepare data' when everthing is good
4. select collections you want to upload
(any collection with title in green will be uploaded)
5. click upload. You will see your link when upload is done.
Depending on your collection's size, upload might cost some time.

placeholder.collectionDB: Choose collection.db in your osu! folder or drop it here...
placeholder.defaultLink: let other players find you. ex. https://osu.ppy.sh/users/peppy
placeholder.defaultAvatar: (optional) will be shown in top of collection's page. ex. https://a.ppy.sh/2
placeholder.osuDB: Choose osu!.db in your osu! folder or drop it here...

upload.isTournamentPool: tournament pool mode (allows you to fill in mods etc.)
upload.restart: start again (any data you filled will be reset)
